name: Runner Knight
description:
Runner Knight is a first person infinite runner with hack and slash elements,
Run and far as you can before the trolls catch you in an infinite ever changing dungeon while dodging traps and fighting enemies. 
using phone rotation for navigation and tap on the left and right of the screen to attack and defend.

Please fill the survey after you played:
https://forms.gle/rJaTb65oYnoVX6fm6
